title.rendered: Apply Now | Redeemer University Admission Requirements 2024

content.rendered:
Redeemer University Admission Requirements and processes, English Language Proficiency Requirements, Application Processes,

Redeemer university Admission Application is ongoing for all interested candidates both international and indigenous are eligible to apply.

 Redeemer University Admission Requirements are as follows:

All applicants from countries other than Canada and the United States will be considered for admittance based on the following necessities:

  • High school diploma (or equivalent);  with a maximum  average of 65%
    • Together with your record, we may also need any secondary school certification/examination results (e.g. CAPRE, WAEC, WASSCE, CXC, HKDSE, etc.). Note that Notarized transcripts may possibly be used in various cases.
  •  The Required documents like the following listed below are valid:
    •  Applicants From an American-based School: a maximum CLT score of 58, ACT score of 19 or SAT score of 980 (if you took the old SAT test, the least amount score of 940 (CR+M) is essential).
      Applicants from an International Baccalaureate (IB) School: the least amount in the total score of 28 points in at least 6 subject areas.
    • All applicants From a school in the British system: General Certificate of Education (GCE) of good standing in 5 subject areas, 2 of which have to be at the A-level

English language Proficiency necessities:

Applicants whose native language is not English must show aptitude test in English and have several options to show their proficiency:

  • TOEFL test score of 86 (iBT).
  • IELTS test score of 6.5.
  • CAEL test score of 70.
  • Duolingo English Test (DET) score of 110

Exemptions:

  • Applicants must attend a secondary school (academic studies) in an English-speaking country full-time for at least three years.
  • Attended an accredited English standard university in full-time academic studies for at least a year.
  • Resided in an English-speaking country for at least four years immediately proceeding to apply to Redeemer.

Redeemer University Admission Application Process

Start your application

  • By clicking Here to start your application online.
  • Fill in the appropriate information (your personal data)
  • Click on continue and follow the given steps

Complete your Application

  • Submit your completed application. It’s free to apply until January 31 (after which it’s $40). note that all payments made are non-refundable.
  • For North American applicants only
  • Forward any additional application materials, as listed on your application portal
  • Apply for your transcripts to be sent to Redeemer’s Admission Office

Accept your offer next steps

  • Accept your admission offer (Congrats!)
  • Apply for monetary aid
  • Apply for accommodation
  • Register for courses
